competitions.name: 星河超级个体Hackathon
competitions.description: 星河超级个体Hackathon诚邀您的参与，由文心大模型、文心快码、百度风投联合发起，期待开发者、创业者、创作者在真实场景中，用AI创造出可落地、可运行的产品原型，用想象力来创造AI真正的现实影响力。

competitions.name: 第一届国际工程智能大赛-自由创新赛道：以智慧拓展工程边界，勇做工程领域的先行者(赛季 1)
competitions.description:
本挑战赛的目标是：
● 激发自主创新： 鼓励参赛者自主发现工程领域的痛点，并提出原创性AI解决方案。
● 拓展应用边界： 探索人工智能在更广阔工程领域的应用潜力。
● 孵化颠覆性方案： 发现并支持具有前瞻性、突破性，甚至可能改变行业格局的智能工程项目。

competitions.name: 第一届国际工程智能大赛-交通工程赛道：面向高韧性交通系统的智能粒流协同挑战赛(赛季 1)
competitions.description: 本挑战赛的目标是：研发能够服务于真实城市交通场景的智能化协同控制方案，将交通管理从“被动响应”升级为“主动引导”，推动智慧交通走向高效、安全与深度协同的新阶段。

competitions.name: 第一届国际工程智能大赛-土木工程赛道：桥梁结构关键构件智能网格生成挑战赛(赛季 1)
competitions.description: 本挑战赛的目标是：研发能够服务于真实桥梁工程场景的智能化网格生成方案，将工程师从繁琐、重复的网格划分工作中解放出来，推动高保真结构分析走向高效、可靠与自动化的新阶段。

competitions.name: 阿里云ESA Pages 边缘开发大赛(赛季 1)
competitions.description: “阿里云ESA Pages 边缘开发大赛”是阿里云边缘安全加速ESA依托天池大赛平台主办的前沿技术赛事。聚焦边缘计算、AI与前端工程的深度融合，让代码和AI在边缘绽放。

competitions.name: 乐聚机器人第一届具身智能操作任务挑战赛&创业启航营(赛季 1)
competitions.description: 挑战赛分为仿真赛与真机赛两个阶段，以主办方设定的四个难度递进的机器人操作任务为核心，参赛队伍需围绕这些任务开发具备感知与决策能力的模型。参赛选手可利用主办方提供的高质量数据集、Baseline代码及配套开发工具开展模型训练与优化，并在模拟器及真机平台上完成测试与评估。

competitions.name: 2025 全国大学生计算机系统能力大赛——第2届PolarDB数据库创新设计赛(赛季 2)
competitions.description: 大赛要求各参赛队具备综合运用各种知识（包括但不局限于数据库系统、数据结构与算法、操作系统、人工智能等）进行数据库系统部署、源码修改与性能调优，完成大赛要求的 PolarDB 数据库系统搭建，探索使用向量索引加速向量查询。

competitions.name: agriBORA Commodity Price Forecasting Challenge
competitions.description: Can you accurately forecast weekly market prices for maize in Kenya?

competitions.name: Farm to Feed Shopping Basket Recommendation Challenge
competitions.description: Can you predict future shopping baskets to recommend better fresh produce purchases?

competitions.name: Barbados Traffic Analysis Challenge
competitions.description: Can you predict traffic flow to identify the root causes of traffic in a Barbados roundabout?

competitions.name: The AI Telco Troubleshooting Challenge
competitions.description: Can your fine-tuned LLM detect and explain unseen network failures?

competitions.name: Measuring What Matters Proposal Challenge by ITU
competitions.description: Can you propose new ways to measure the environmental footprint of AI models?

competitions.name: MPEG-G: Decoding the Dialogue
competitions.description: Can you determine host-microbiome interactions in metagenomic data?

competitions.name: Adaptation Atlas Data Storytelling Challenge (Track 4): Infectious Diseases
competitions.description: Can you tell great data stories about the climate–infectious disease nexus in Africa?

competitions.name: Adaptation Atlas Data Storytelling Challenge (Track 2): Crop Pests and Diseases
competitions.description: Can you tell great data stories about climate impact on crop pests and diseases in Africa?

competitions.name: Adaptation Atlas Data Storytelling Challenge (Track 5): Rainfall
competitions.description: Can you tell great data stories about climate impacts on rainfall reliability in Africa?

competitions.name: Adaptation Atlas Data Storytelling Challenge (Track 6): Forest Cover
competitions.description: Can you tell great data stories about climate impacts on forest cover change in Africa?

competitions.name: Adaptation Atlas Data Storytelling Challenge (Track 3): Soil Health and Food Security
competitions.description: Can you tell great data stories about the climate impacts on soil health, agricultural resilience, and food security in Africa?

competitions.name: Adaptation Atlas Data Storytelling Challenge (Track 1): Water Security, Agriculture and Health
competitions.description: Can you tell great data stories about climate impact on water security, agriculture and health in Africa?

competitions.name: Barbados Lands and Surveys Plot Automation Challenge
competitions.description: Can you identify and digitise important information in analog cadastral plans?

competitions.name: Ghana’s Indigenous Intel Challenge [BEGINNERS ONLY]
competitions.description: Can you forecast rainfall based on Ghanaian farmers’ indigenous weather wisdom?

competitions.name: GEOAI Challenge for Cropland Mapping in Dry Environments
competitions.description: Can you develop an accurate and cost-effective method for cropland mapping?

competitions.name: Your Voice, Your Device, Your Language Challenge
competitions.description: Can you build a Swahili ASR solution to give a voice to 100 million people?

competitions.name: MPEG-G Microbiome Classification Challenge
competitions.description: Can you classify microbiome samples by body site and individual using compressed data?

competitions.name: PyCon Somalia 2025 Hackathon
competitions.description: Combating Food Insecurity in Somalia

competitions.name: Classification for Landslide Detection
competitions.description: Can you create a classification model to identify landslides?

competitions.name: The ARC Challenge: Africa
competitions.description: Build models that can actually reason and win a trip to Deep Learning Indaba 2025
